string.name: init_output
string.value: 休眠锁关闭，可定时息屏

string.name: search_support
string.value: 查询系统是否支持休眠锁

string.name: supportLock
string.value: 本系统支持阻止系统休眠的锁

string.name: unSupportLock
string.value: 本系统不支持阻止系统休眠的锁

string.name: stopSleep
string.value: 休眠锁已打开,无法定时熄屏

string.name: turnSleep
string.value: 该锁已被解除,5s后可定时熄屏
